availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Morgan in Morgan County, Kentucky, on December 9, 1834. Father of James Harvey Morgan, Elizabeth Morgan, John Morgan, Paris Morgan, Sarah Morgan, and Margaret Morgan. Resident in Morgan County in 1840. Farmer in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 305.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 142A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 2, p. 368.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 30.
